About Karan Nawani

Karan Nawani is an Indian pop artist based in Dehradun, Uttarakhand. He answered the call to music in 2017 and has been on a remarkable journey ever since. With over 1 million subscribers on YouTube, Nawani reaches and inspires millions of listeners around the globe.

Young, passionate, and constantly exploring new sonic landscapes, Karan Nawani brings a fresh and distinctive imprint to modern Indian pop music. His sound blends emotion, simplicity, and contemporary influences, resonating deeply with audiences across generations.

A self-taught producer, composer, and singer-songwriter, Nawani‚Äôs interdisciplinary approach sets him apart in today‚Äôs music scene. From unplugged covers to original compositions and creative mashups, his work reflects authenticity, creativity, and a deep love for storytelling through sound.
